svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content:
<mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/26.0.9 Chrome/128.0.6613.186 Electron/32.2.5 Safari/537.36" version="26.0.9"> <diagram name="第 1 页" id="tlNv5IBGNDtWrDL-MxnU"> <mxGraphModel dx="2670" dy="1238" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="tFzl6a1USeYZD9AfNBXS-1" value="存储和通信" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;labelPosition=left;verticalLabelPosition=middle;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;fontSize=40;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="70" y="797" width="491" height="248" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tFzl6a1USeYZD9AfNBXS-2" value="主进程" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=40;labelPosition=center;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;align=center;verticalAlign=top;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="151" y="1095" width="449" height="456" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tFzl6a1USeYZD9AfNBXS-3" value="渲染进程" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;labelPosition=center;verticalLabelPosition=top;align=center;verticalAlign=bottom;fontSize=40;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="601" y="350" width="994" height="695" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tFzl6a1USeYZD9AfNBXS-4" value="语言文件" style="whiteSpace=wrap;strokeWidth=2;labelPosition=center;verticalLabelPosition=top;align=center;verticalAlign=bottom;fontSize=40;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="350" width="561" height="176" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tFzl6a1USeYZD9AfNBXS-5" value="src/locales/zh-cn.json

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 141px; height: 1px; padding-top: 629px; margin-left: 238px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
localStorage
保存用户语言偏好
配置在User/preferences.json

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 196px; height: 1px; padding-top: 621px; margin-left: 431px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
IPC通信
进程间通信
同步语言状态
